entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: XmlSerializerTests.XmlMembersMapping_With_ChoiceIdentifier, XmlSerializerTests.XmlMembersMapping_IntArray #68527
    7.0.0
  • Single file executable still generates DLL file #68526
  • File.CreateAsSymbolicLink should throw if not able to create the symlink due to do not having permission #68525
  • Update BinderTracingTest.AssemblyLoadContextResolving_ReturnNull to not assume reflection semantics #68521
  • TypeDescriptor.GetConverter call always use AssemblyLoadContext.Default #68520
  • Follow-up improvements for #67636 #68519
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'link' in 'System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionServices:TryExportMetadataForMember(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,byref)' #68513
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName non-nullable #68512
  • Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests #68511
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'paddingToAdd == paddingNeeded' in 'System.SpanTests.IndexOfAnyExceptTests`1[Byte][System.Byte]:SomeElementsDontMatch_ReturnsOffset(int,System.Int32[]):this' #68510
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Publish `dotnet.worker.js` #68509
  • [wasm-mt] The `browser-wasm` runtime pack should pack both single- and multi-threaded builds. #68508
  • [wasm-mt] place multi-threaded wasm build into separate artifacts folders #68506
  • (Error .Net Core 5) "Directory.GetDirectories("D:")" returns not existingDirectory #68503
  • [wasm-mt] PInvokeTableGenerator doesn't like the wasm-mt-eventpipe sample #68498
  • ANCM PostStartCheck Failure #68497
  • crossgen2 --callchain-profile usage #68491
  • Assertion failed 'ssaNum != SsaConfig::RESERVED_SSA_NUM' during 'VN based copy prop' #68479
    7.0.0
  • Regex.Matches very very slow on Android #68504
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ClientAsyncAuthenticateTest.ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails(clientProtocol: Tls12, serverProtocol: Ssl3, expectedException: typeof(System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException)) #68476

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed 'optLoopTable[i].lpContainedBy in windows arm64 pgo libraries stress test #58785
    7.0.0
  • Immutable*<T> classes do not perform well #68449
  • Optimize threadpool paths in CoreCLR used by ASP.NET #8299
    Future
  • win32threadpool.cpp should use GetQueuedCompletionStatusEx rather than GetQueuedCompletionStatus #11314
    Future
  • Move the IOCP thread pool on windows to managed code #46610
    7.0.0
  • Enhance lifetime monitoring in EventListener #45247
    7.0.0
  • Improve handling of lazy loops in regex source generator / compiler #68415
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-trace collect causes the target application to receive SIGBUS on armv7l #66772
    6.0.x
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'arg->OperIsStore() || arg->OperIsCopyBlkOp()' in PGO testing #68472
  • AddUserSecrets fails in environment for "DOTNET_USER_SECRETS_FALLBACK_DIR" #66219
    Future
  • ConfigurationBuilder add elements to initialized array instead of replacing it #36569
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan<char>.Enumerate(ReadOnlySpan<char> delimiter, StringComparer comparer) #68487
  • ArrayMarshaller.cs file doesn't get included when a project sets DisableImplicitAssemblyReferences to false but depends on System.Memory #67425
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add browsable attribute support for ValueType. #68485
  • `Install native dependencies` step failing in CI on macOS #68483
  • [HTTP/3] Typo in the header's name #68407
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.sh #68474
  • OSArchitecture is wrong on non-Windows #58463
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.CodeDom.Tests failing in CI #68477

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete `CLS_VAR` #68524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extend stress timeouts for merged tests #68523
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce leaked test files #68522
    area-System.IO
  • Always set `IND_NONFAULTING` for not-null addresses #68518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DI spec tests for scope factory singleton, hierarchical scopes #68517
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up NonBacktracking doubly-linked changes #68514
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • add RID for Alpine 3.16 #68505
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load (another try) #68502
    NO-MERGE, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Disable profiler multiple test against JIT and GC stress runs #68501
    test-bug, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fixes #41234 (#41376) #68500
    community-contribution
  • Move reflection based converter and contract resolution logic to DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver #68496
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix runtime-llvm pipeline #68495
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Fix linux/arm64 emscripten provisioning #68492
    area-Build-mono
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Rafactor of getProperties mechanism #68486
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Copy the SSA name when cloning locals #68482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Assign PropertyCache after it's configured for source gen in attempt to fix JSON LookupProperty assert failing #68480
    area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • Fix nullable reference type warnings in RegexGenerator #68516
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Do not use '.NET Core' anymore in error messages #68260
    area-Host
  • Use unchecked barriers for stores to statics in more cases #68437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Recognize more "local addr" trees as invariant #68484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix VS complaining about missing projects in slns #68488
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Consolidate `MessageBox` API usage #68396
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary work from lazy loops (and a little from greedy) #68490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix superpmi.py overridden build_type arg #68507
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area-owners for acquisition and deployment #68499
    area-Meta
  • Increase Span.Reverse test coverage #68493
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • Add parts of an assert back #68481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add requested version to hostfxr_resolve_sdk2 #68355
    area-Host
  • AddUserSecrets fails in environments without generic env var and OS special folders #67895
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add Windows and Ubuntu perf runs on Ampere hw #68304
  • Fix caching of Lazy<T> in tests #68473
  • Fix CircleInConvex test #68475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix significant TP diff check for percentages #68459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change Nullable to default to enable in libraries src and ref projects #68102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve the redundant branch optimization to handle more side effects #68447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle final elements in SpanHelpers.Contains for byte and char vectorized #67492
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Copy the LLVM jobs into their own pipeline #68392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ensure that System.Guid can build successfully #68494
  • Vectorize Guid equality. #66889
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix header upgrade-insecure-requests name #68412
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [Android][tvOS] Skip failing System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Don't build non shared framework refs in ref build #68275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Revert "Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load" #68478

Updated

  • [mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Override CompleteAsync() in StreamPipeReader to call Stream.DisposeAsync #67565
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [debugger] Fix debugging wasm sample #68421
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Decouple call store operands from local ret buf optimization #68469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Removed TempFile and TempDirectory from FileSystemWatcher Tests #68444
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Delete unused Crossgen2PackageRID property #66814
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix createdump on Unix platforms that do not implement process_vm_readv #67544
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • skip the test when dotnet.exe is locked #66196
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • WIP: Use csel for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Postpone dispose of sendContentCacnellationToken for HTTP3 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Better default for L3 cache size on win-arm64 and lin-arm64 #64645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove stores as operands of calls in LIR #68460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    area-System.Console, 6.0.x
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Use a faster sort algorithm pdqsort for Array.Sort #68436
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Call methods with byref parameters, e.g. this #1873

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve SDK test reliability #25044
    7.0.1xx
  • Possible build time regression on empty macOS (Arm64) projects #25037
  • Additional files in blazor hybrid project throw error by default #25058

PullRequests

Created

  • Next helix test move #25057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change tests to target 4.6.2 instead of 4.6.1 #25056
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.400 #25050
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the netcoreapp2.1 and netcoreapp2.2 to the current framework #25039
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update baselines for Blazor static web assets #25049
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Reduce parallel copies of the test .zip file that were overlapping #25054
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try to update a couple of more versions of the cryptography file #25023
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix copy-paste mistakes #25038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update SDK to 6.0.4 #25018
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow file changes from tar as it's just a warning #24971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Next set of three test projects to move to Helix. #23975
    Area-Infrastructure
  • update exception message for invalid rollback file #24973
    Area-Workloads
  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24914
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Capture implemented native int conversions #6059

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FAR misclassifies target-typed constructor call sites #60949
  • Raw string completion should match leading indentation of previous line #60946
  • Raw string newline completion should indent when the previous line ends with open brace #60945
  • `nuint->nint` conversion should emit no conversion #60944
    17.3
  • We're using the wrong simplifier options in a cross-language case #60941
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Localizations #60940
  • Generate Editorconfig produces half german properties. Should be english. #60939
  • Allow making attributes suppress warnings with `(Unconditional)SuppressMessage` #60938

Closed

  • Lambda using 'sbyte' as parameter name overflows the parsing stack #60661
    17.3
  • Inheritance margin crashing when multiple symbols are on the same line. #60894
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Move the load of project completion providers to background #60950
    Area-IDE
  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE
  • Remove non-servicing branches from our PublishData #60947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow VSMac to access LSP options #60943
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add configs for 17.3 branch and update main version #60942
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Consolidate and simplify visibility checks in the tagger. #60923
    Area-IDE, 17.3.P1

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60952
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #60951
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • Use ExpeditedDelay in with our features that pause while non-visible #60608
    Area-IDE
  • Update 'convert to raw string' to help cleanup strings with leading whitespace #60936
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Forbid types with required members from substituting for where T : new() #60788
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Verify arguments length for diagnostic messages #60925
    Area-Compilers
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel's GetClientCertificateAsync caches failures #41369
  • Assembly Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation fails to load when running on Linux #41368
  • In .Net 6 getting view was not found when adding MVC controller and Views to existing Web API project #41364
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.HttpClientHttp2InteropTests.Settings_MaxFrameSize_Larger_Server #41363
  • Add an Analyzer to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #41362
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Unexpected Error if blazor page has same URl for two pages #41361
  • Razor binding in button isnt displayed #41357
  • Multiple route match simultaneously #41354
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclosehttps #41352
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #41351

Closed

  • InstallVisualStudio.ps1 and BuildFromSource.md should update to VS 2022 #39599
  • Http.sys server should support setting up URL groups when attaching to an existing queue #40359
    7.0-preview5
  • Mark more blobs as non-shipping #40050
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.4.22218.29] grpc-dotnet-2.40.0 Functional Test failed with System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException #41297
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #41336
  • Disable Control + C Feature in Kestrel #41359
  • Visual studio 2022 17.2 preview1 excessive exception logging #41301
  • Re: Deeplinking URL with Parameters in Blazor WebAssembly #40714 #41353
  • Adding swagger to Blazor Server app break the Blazor Server App. #41223

PullRequests

Created

  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-preview4] Add MapGroup #41367
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • release/6.0 port of abort handling #41360
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Configure Http.sys UrlGroup when CreateOrAttach is specified and the specified UrlPrefixes do not exist #41366
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.HttpClientHttp2InteropTests.Settin… #41365
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Add MapGroup #41265
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `80600e5` to `bf66935` #41355
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Reduce invocation allocations #41344
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview5
  • PRs from Pranav will be considered community contribution going forward #41350
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Pool the missing ReadAsync state machine #41345
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Support all return types from handler in filters #41310
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41305 #41332
    area-runtime
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Debug `dotnet restore` problems #41331
    area-infrastructure
  • Throw BadHttpRequestException for non-ASCII in absolute-form targets #41334
    area-runtime
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-stack report hangs when run in a directory without write permissions #3030
    .NET 7.0
  • DiagnosticSource and DiagnosticListener #3029

Closed

  • Correctly Document UNMANAGED_CODE_TIME vs CPU_TIME #1166
    .NET 7.0
  • dotnet-trace topn report can misprint method names #2994
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Write temp files to tempdir #3031
    bug, dotnet-stack

Merged

  • Update tool to account for missing symbol #3021
    .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationPage.SetTitleView not rendering properly on Android #6495
  • Context menu on wrong position in Windows #6490
    .NET 7
  • Maui RC1 - "System.NotSupportedException: Must call AddTerm AddSeparator in that order" #6489
  • Cannot find Could not load signature of Xamarin.HotReload.Loader:CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve #6488
  • WebView within TabbedPage on Android has weird scrolling interactions #6487
  • Grid ColumnDefinitions aren't supporting data binding on Width property #6485
  • Issues with collection view displaying only first item and scrolling crashes app #6484
  • Button Focus and Unfocus can't fire when run on MacOS #6482
    6.0.300
  • Handles CoreWebView2.ProcessFailed in BlazorWebView #6481
  • After selecting "Delete" and "Update", no information is getting announced by talkback. #6477
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Heading level is not defined for "Find the recipe for you" heading. #6475
    6.0.300-servicing
  • "Click here to view full recipe" and "Add to my recipes" are unnecessarily given as headings. #6474
    6.0.300-servicing
  • No role is defined for "Click here to view full recipe" control. #6473
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ObservableCollection<T> range operation support/test plan #6471
  • cannot install maui main - Workload.Mono.ToolChain.Manifest missing signature #6470
  • Control Frame used in a ControlTemplate doesn't work on Windows #6467
    6.0.300-servicing
  • AbsoluteLayout.SetLayoutBounds() causes all AbsoluteLayout children to be measured and layed out. #6466
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Images don't load correctly on Android #6464
    6.0.300-rc.3

Closed

  • handling AppDomain.CurrentDomain.FirstChanceException crashes Android #6494
  • Network images load extremely slowly on Windows #6465
    6.0.300-servicing
  • (Windows) RC1 - SwipeView - Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt #6401
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • System.AccessViolationException when using SwipeView in a CollectionView on Windows #6153
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Picker on iOS does not have the title placeholder when nothing is selected #672
    6.0.300
  • ArcSegments are rendered as straight lines #6128
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android] Crash using a CollectionView with a RefreshView #4109
    6.0.300
  • Images not rendering correctly #5484
    6.0.300
  • VisualElement Focused, Unfocused, and SizeChanged events aren't getting fired. #3820
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Focus() seems unimplemented on Handlers #3860
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] AppThemeBinding issues #1160
    6.0.300
  • HttpClient in AndroidApp crash again #6460
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Current Count text in Hello World solution does not display in UI after clicking button #6458
    6.0.300
  • [Exception] InsertPageBefore cause "Previous Navigation Request is still Processing" #6478
    6.0.300
  • Maui deploy on Android corrupted System #3528
    6.0.300
  • Mapper naming inconsistencies #6469
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Picker doesn't visually update its selected value on iOS #3504
    6.0.300
  • First time Picker selection (except 1st item) not working in iOS #5505
    6.0.300
  • There should be parse error when setting invalid value to FlowDirection property #6343
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Secure storage calling twice/thrice bug #6437
  • RC1 - The BackgroundColor of the BoxView does not work #6443
  • ViewModel in Page .NET MAUI RC1 - Signed apk installed in device. #6405

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix WebView2 Runtime download link for Blazor MAUI #6492
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix theme and NRE on Android and Fix Icons on WinUI #6491
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.100-preview.2.22102.8 to 7.0.100-preview.5.22224.1 #6480
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix Border content position and clipping #6472
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix crash using SwipeView inside CollectionView #6220
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/SwipeView
  • [Windows] Not render shadows on without a ShadowColor #6191
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Use Picker Title when selected item cleared #6483
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Fix ArcSegment rendering #6264
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Tweak template styles some more #6425
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Remove interfering keyboard focus logic #6246
    area/a11y, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-general, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Housekeeping] Fix Mapper naming inconsistencies #6476
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Adds FlowDirection Design TypeConverter #6384
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • MacOS `main` Development Setup #6462

Updated

  • Handle content hiding separately for hot restart scenarios #6341
    area-blazor, area/tooling ⚙️
  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • Updated Default project template title #6319
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Add a default handler for all views #6447
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Return zero for scaled screen size when density is zero #6337
  • [iOS] Add dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [workload] Merge Dependencies and Extensions packs #5918
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS Safe Areas #6432
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.300
  • Fix SwipeItems.CollectionChanged sender issue #6342
    t/bug, area/SwipeView
  • feat: added Visibility property for UWP compatibility #6381
    .NET 7
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Core] Fix issue not finding IAnimationManager #6364
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬
  • Fix AmbigousMatchException between duplicated types Core and Controls #6409
    t/bug
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Fix viewcell margins on listview #6431
    area/ListView
  • [Tizen] Non-Nullable NativeParent #6459
    platform/tizen

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scaffolding option to specify a class suffix #27887
  • Scaffolding creates lowercase DbContext #27886
  • EF Core is closing the connection in async flow #27882
  • Global API to turn off code generation if Table has triggers and optimization in code generation #27879
  • Allow setting timeouts for the design-time tools #27878

Closed

  • A foreign key is not being genrated for self referencing indirect many-to-many relationship #27785
  • DbUpdateException is handled but exception is sent to Azure Application Insight #27885
  • Don't check for a connection string until after ConnectionOpening has been called #23085
    7.0.0-preview5
  • Multidimensional array regression from NET 5 > 6 - The type Double[,] does not represent a sequence #26975
    7.0.0-preview5
  • EF is populating available data from Local into nested collection automatically.. can this be turned off? #27883

PullRequests

Created

  • Add CommandInitialized interceptor #27884

Merged

  • Stop validating non-null/empty connection strings #27874
  • Fixes to support multi-dimensional arrays #27618
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Reduce SaveChanges roundtrips #27713
  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
  • Suppress uninitialized DbSet warnings when a ctor is present #27869

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 6.0.400 non-stable #13695

Merged

  • Update readme for preview 4 #13691
  • Remove pathcch dependency #13646

Updated

  • [main] Use arcade version that targets net7.0 #13676
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #13678
